Location-based Scope 2 emissions for FY20, FY21 and FY22 are 1,308,665 tCO2-e, 1,291,155 tCO2-e and [XX] respectively. FY19 Scope 1 and 2 emissions are reported under the NGER Act, as was FY20 previously.

(4) Scope 3 data includes the indirect component of our Scope 1 and 2 emissions such as transmitting the electricity we use, emissions from waste disposal and air travel
